https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/62YdQrgEfUDdNJfEPeI6dqrUNKp.jpg The Banfield Killer returns to face enemies even more sinister than himself: an art dealer, a corrupt policeman, an overly curious journalist, a vengeful man and a professor from Europe stand in the way of Tepes, who seeks to reunite with his mysteriously disappeared daughter. Banfield Killer II: The Ballad of Vlad Tepes
